妺字的基本解释

妺
mò
〔妺喜〕传说中国夏王桀的妃子。

妺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mò］
［《廣韻》莫撥切，入末，明。］
见“妺喜”。

妺字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　妺； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页257第29
【廣韻】莫撥切【集韻】【正韻】莫葛切，?音末。【莊子·天道篇】鼠壤有餘蔬，而棄妺不仁。【註】謂末學不誘納而棄之。玩上下文，宜作妹。【林雲銘·莊子因】棄妺諸解俱未妥，大約以食有餘，而棄其妹于不養，是謂不仁。此解爲正。　又桀妻妹嬉，通作妺嬉。按路史註，妹以妹妹目之，似宜从妹。

妺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　妺; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 257 29
[Guang Yun] Mo Pianqie [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Geqie, the end of the sound. [Zhuangzi·Tiandao Chapter] Rats have leftovers in the soil, but abandoning them is unkind. [Note] It is said that the last learning will not be lured and discarded. Play with the context, it is appropriate to make a sister. [Lin Yunming·Zhuang Ziyin] Abandoning all the solutions is unsatisfactory, and it is not benevolent to abandon his sister for no support. This solution is positive.　The wife and sister play again, and they all play together. According to Lu Shi's note, the younger sister regards the younger sister as her sister, and it seems appropriate to follow her.
